verb.description: Ride a bicycle with the pedals at rest, especially downhill.
examples: he had come freewheeling down the road

verb.description: Act or proceed in a relaxed or casual way, without making much effort.
examples: I'm not the sort of person who would freewheel his way to the end of a contract
another manager might have been willing to freewheel through one final season

noun.description: A device that allows a bicycle wheel to revolve forward while the crank is stationary.
